extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the Disk Encryption Percentage for PGP. This attribute template applies to PGP (v 10).
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh #This script has been verified to work on PGP (v 10). #Check to see if PGP is installed if [ -f "/usr/local/bin/pgpwde" ]; then todo=`/usr/local/bin/pgpwde --disk-status | grep "Total sectors" | awk '{print $3}'` done=`/usr/local/bin/pgpwde --disk-status | grep "highwatermark" | awk '{print $5}'` result=$( echo "scale=4; ($done / $todo) * 100" | bc | cut -c 1-4 ) if [ "$result" == "" ]; then echo "<result>Disk is not instrumented.</result>" else echo "<result>$result</result>" fi else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
